panels.visual: Corpium stands over Whortheus's fresh grave, massive bronze-scaled form silhouetted against grey sky. His yellow reptilian eyes show no grief - only cold pragmatism. Patricia II hangs from his back.
panels.dialogue: Corpium: "My brother was a fool. Always was."

panels.visual: Eurostras looks guilty, unable to meet Corpium's gaze. Armando places Whortheus's crystal orb into Gimel's Shin form for safekeeping.
panels.dialogue:
Eurostras: "I'm sorry. I tried to save him, butâ€”"
Corpium: "Save your apologies. Is there loot involved in your quest?"

panels.visual: The newly formed party walks toward the distant walls of Waterdeep, visible on the horizon. Corpium's massive form leads, Armando's crimson coat bright against the grey day.
panels.dialogue: Armando: "The Wizard Council awaits. And they owe us answers about Godrick."
